verses.text: But it came to pass within a while \w after|strong="H3117"\w*, in the \w time|strong="H3117"\w* of \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*, that \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w visited|strong="H6485"\w* his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* with a \w kid|strong="H1423"\w*; and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* to my \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* into the \w chamber|strong="H2315"\w*. But her \w father|strong="H0001"\w* would not \w suffer|strong="H5414"\w* him to go \w in|strong="H0935"\w*.

And her \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I \w verily|strong="H0559"\w* \w thought|strong="H0559"\w* that thou hadst \w utterly|strong="H8130"\w* \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* her; therefore I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* her to thy \w companion|strong="H4828"\w*: \add is\add* not her \w younger|strong="H6996"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* \w fairer|strong="H2896"\w* than she? take her, I pray thee, instead of her.\f + \fr 15.2 \ft take…: Heb. let her be thine\f*

¶ And \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* concerning them, \w Now|strong="H6471"\w* shall I be more \w blameless|strong="H5352"\w* than the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, though I \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them a \w displeasure|strong="H7451"\w*.\f + \fr 15.3 \ft more…: or, blameless from the Philistines though, etc\f*

And \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w caught|strong="H3920"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w foxes|strong="H7776"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w firebrands|strong="H3940"\w*, and \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* \w tail|strong="H2180"\w* to \w tail|strong="H2180"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w firebrand|strong="H3940"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* between \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tails|strong="H2180"\w*.\f + \fr 15.4 \ft firebrands: or, torches\f*

And when he had \w set|strong="H1197"\w* the \w brands|strong="H3940"\w* on \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, he let \add them\add* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* into the standing \w corn|strong="H7054"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and burnt \w up|strong="H1197"\w* both the \w shocks|strong="H1430"\w*, and also the standing \w corn|strong="H7054"\w*, with the \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w* \add and\add* \w olives|strong="H2132"\w*.

¶ Then the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Who hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* this? And they \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w*, the son in \w law|strong="H2860"\w* of the \w Timnite|strong="H8554"\w*, because he had \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, and \w given|strong="H5414"\w* her to his \w companion|strong="H4828"\w*. And the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* her and her \w father|strong="H0001"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

¶ And \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Though|strong="H0518"\w* ye have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, yet will I be \w avenged|strong="H5358"\w* of you, and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that I will \w cease|strong="H2308"\w*.

And he \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them \w hip|strong="H7785"\w* \w and|strong="H5921"\w* \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w* with a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4347"\w*: and he went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w top|strong="H5585"\w* of the \w rock|strong="H5553"\w* \w Etam|strong="H5862"\w*.

¶ Then the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w spread|strong="H5203"\w* themselves in \w Lehi|strong="H3896"\w*.

And the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Why are ye come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against us? And they \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, To \w bind|strong="H0631"\w* \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* are we come \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* to him as he hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to us.

Then \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w went|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w top|strong="H5585"\w* of the \w rock|strong="H5553"\w* \w Etam|strong="H5862"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w*, \w Knowest|strong="H3045"\w* thou not that the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \add are\add* \w rulers|strong="H4910"\w* over us? what \add is\add* this \add that\add* thou hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w* unto us? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, As they \w did|strong="H6213"\w* unto me, so have I \w done|strong="H6213"\w* unto them.\f + \fr 15.11 \ft went: Heb. went down\f*

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, We are come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w bind|strong="H0631"\w* thee, that we may \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* thee into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*. And \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Swear|strong="H7650"\w* unto me, that ye will not fall \w upon|strong="H6293"\w* me yourselves.

And they \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, No; but we will \w bind|strong="H0631"\w* thee \w fast|strong="H0631"\w*, and \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* thee into their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: but \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* we will not \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* thee. And they \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* him with \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w cords|strong="H5688"\w*, and brought him \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from the \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*.

¶ \add And\add* when he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w Lehi|strong="H3896"\w*, the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w shouted|strong="H7321"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* him: and the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came \w mightily|strong="H6743"\w* upon him, and the \w cords|strong="H5688"\w* that \add were\add* upon his \w arms|strong="H2220"\w* became as \w flax|strong="H6593"\w* that was \w burnt|strong="H1197"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and his \w bands|strong="H0612"\w* \w loosed|strong="H4549"\w* from off his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.\f + \fr 15.14 \ft loosed: Heb. were melted\f*

And he \w found|strong="H4672"\w* a \w new|strong="H2961"\w* \w jawbone|strong="H3895"\w* of an \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*, and put \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* it, and \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* therewith.\f + \fr 15.15 \ft new: Heb. moist\f*

And \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, With the \w jawbone|strong="H3895"\w* of an \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*, \w heaps|strong="H2565"\w* upon \w heaps|strong="H2565"\w*, with the \w jaw|strong="H3895"\w* of an \w ass|strong="H2543"\w* have I \w slain|strong="H5221"\w* a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*.\f + \fr 15.16 \ft heaps upon…: Heb. an heap, two heaps\f*

And it came to pass, when he had made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w*, that he cast \w away|strong="H7993"\w* the \w jawbone|strong="H3895"\w* out of his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* that \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w Ramath-lehi|strong="H7437"\w*.\f + \fr 15.17 \ft Ramath-lehi: that is, the lifting up of the jawbone, or, casting away of the jawbone\f*

¶ And he was \w sore|strong="H3966"\w* \w athirst|strong="H6770"\w*, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* on the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou hast \w given|strong="H5414"\w* this \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w deliverance|strong="H8668"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*: and now shall I \w die|strong="H4191"\w* for \w thirst|strong="H6772"\w*, and \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w*?

But \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w clave|strong="H1234"\w* an hollow \w place|strong="H4388"\w* that \add was\add* in the \w jaw|strong="H3895"\w*, and there \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* thereout; and when he had \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w*, his \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* came \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, and he \w revived|strong="H2421"\w*: wherefore he \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* thereof \w En-hakkore|strong="H5875"\w*, which \add is\add* in \w Lehi|strong="H3896"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 15.19 \ft En-hakkore: that is, the well of him that called or, cried\f*\f + \fr 15.19 \ft the jaw: or, Lehi, as called in this chapter\f*
And he \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.
